workflow.name: Improving title clarity with Google Sheets and email notifications
workflow.description:
## üéÅ Automate YouTube Giveaway Winner Selection with YouTube Comments Scraper API

**Description:**
Easily automate your YouTube video giveaways using n8n and the [**YouTube Comments Scraper API**](https://rapidapi.com/PrineshPatel/api/youtube-comments-scraper). This workflow fetches comments, selects a random winner, logs results to Google Sheets, and notifies the admin‚Äîall hands-free!

---

## üß© Node-by-Node Breakdown

| Node | Name                             | Purpose                                                                                                                                      |
| ---- | -------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 1Ô∏è‚É£  | **Form Trigger**                 | Captures a YouTube video URL from a user via form submission.                                                                                |
| 2Ô∏è‚É£  | **Fetch YouTube Comments**       | Makes a POST request to [**YouTube Comments Scraper API**](https://rapidapi.com/PrineshPatel/api/youtube-comments-scraper) to retrieve comments. |
| 3Ô∏è‚É£  | **Check API Response Status**    | Ensures that the response status is `200` before proceeding.                                                                                 |
| 4Ô∏è‚É£  | **Select Random Commenter**      | Parses the comments and selects a random commenter as the giveaway winner.                                                                   |
| 5Ô∏è‚É£  | **Log Winner to Google Sheet**   | Appends winner name, video URL, and date to a Google Sheet for record-keeping.                                                               |
| 6Ô∏è‚É£  | **Notify Winner Email**          | Sends a congratulatory email to the admin with the selected winner's name.                                                                   |
| 7Ô∏è‚É£  | **Notify: Invalid API Response** | If the API fails, sends an alert to the admin about the issue.                                                                               |


---

## üîë How to Get Your RapidAPI Key

To use the [**YouTube Comments Scraper API**](https://rapidapi.com/PrineshPatel/api/youtube-comments-scraper), follow these steps:

1. Go to [**YouTube Comments Scraper API**](https://rapidapi.com/PrineshPatel/api/youtube-comments-scraper).
2. Sign in or create a free RapidAPI account.
3. Click the **"Subscribe to Test"** button.
4. Copy your **x-rapidapi-key** from the "Code Snippets" or "Header Parameters" section.
5. Paste it into your HTTP Request node in n8n.

---

## üéØ Use Case & Benefits

### ‚úÖ Use Case:

* Automatically pick a **random commenter** from a **YouTube video** as a **giveaway winner**.

### üöÄ Benefits:

* **Fully automated** ‚Äì no manual comment scanning or random selection.
* **Accurate & fair** ‚Äì random selection from valid commenters only.
* **Time-saving** ‚Äì especially for creators running multiple giveaways.
* **Integrated logging** ‚Äì keep a historical record of all winners in Google Sheets.
* **Email alerts** ‚Äì get notified whether the flow succeeds or fails.

---

## üë• Who Is This For?

* **YouTube Content Creators** running giveaways.
* **Marketing Teams** promoting products via YouTube contests.
* **Agencies** managing influencer campaigns.
* **Developers & Automation Enthusiasts** looking to simplify giveaway processes.

---

## üí° Why Use YouTube Comments Scraper API?

The [**YouTube Comments Scraper API**](https://rapidapi.com/PrineshPatel/api/youtube-comments-scraper) offers a simple and effective way to extract public YouTube comments programmatically. It‚Äôs fast, reliable, and integrates smoothly with platforms like n8n.

You‚Äôll use this API:

* To retrieve all comments from a YouTube video.
* To power fair and transparent giveaways.
* To trigger downstream automations like winner logging and notification.
---
Create your **free n8n account** and set up the workflow in just a few minutes using the link below:

üëâ [Start Automating with n8n](https://n8n.partnerlinks.io/7fuarh1e6dz5)

Save time, stay consistent, and grow your LinkedIn presence effortlessly!

parameters.html:
Hello,

The attempt to fetch comments from the provided YouTube URL did not succeed.  
Please verify the URL and try again.

If the problem persists, please check the API key or contact support.

Best regards,  
YouTube Giveaway Bot
parameters.subject: YouTube Comments Scraper: API Request Failed

parameters.html:
=Hello ,

The YouTube giveaway has concluded, and the winner has been selected!

Winner: {{$json.randomAuthorDisplayName}}

The winner's details have been logged in the spreadsheet for your records.

Best regards,  
Your Giveaway Automation Bot
parameters.subject: =Congratulations! {{$json.randomAuthorDisplayName}} is the Winner of the Giveaway!

parameters.content:
Sends a POST request to RapidAPI to scrape YouTube comments from the given URL.
Includes API key and necessary headers for authentication.

Triggers the workflow when a form with a YouTube URL is submitted.
Captures the URL input for further processing.

Checks if the API response status code equals 200 (success).
Routes workflow based on success or failure of the API call.

Extracts author names from the fetched comments.
Randomly selects one commenter as the giveaway winner.

Sends an email notification if the API call fails or returns an invalid response.
Alerts the admin to verify URL or API credentials.

Appends the winner‚Äôs name, URL, and submission date to a Google Sheet.
Uses service account authentication for Google Sheets access.

Sends a congratulatory email announcing the giveaway winner.
Includes the winner‚Äôs name and relevant giveaway details.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
